answers.answer: unless you have been on antibiotics your oral thruch would suggest an immune system change which may or may not be linked to your thyroid disease. do you have diabetes or have you been checked for that. there is a rare  condition when you have autoimmune thyroid disease and diabetes (which is autoimmune also )and develop oral thrush. its not something terrible it just needs proper monitoring and the proper diagnosis.very treatable.

also when was the last time you had your free T4,free T3 and TSH done. make sure they check your freeT3 atleast once also. ther are rare patients that only have elevated T3 levels and could cause your current symptoms. also with these symptoms an ekg and a consult with a cardiologist would be a good idea as well. hope this helps.
